title: TOG retains personal data based on three criteria
statement: TOG retains personal data as long as there's an ongoing relationship, legal obligation requires it, or it's needed to safeguard TOG's legal position.

citations.quote: TOG retains your personal data as long as it has an ongoing relationship with you; TOG retains your personal data where it is required to do so by a legal obligation... TOG retains your personal data where this is advisable to safeguard or improve TOG's legal position
